ModMetaData.name: Multiplayer Compatibility
ModMetaData.author: notfood
ModMetaData.description:
Miscellaneous patches to make Multiplayer work Mod Support: - Alpha Animals - Animals Logic - Genetic Rim - Path Avoid - Power Switch - Stuffed Floors - Time of day Switch - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Farming - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Power - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Security - Vanilla Fishing Expanded
Partial Support: - Simple Sidearms
